response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it would be a valuable addition to your business. I understand its worth to you stands at $800,000, and based on our company's valuation and the market conditions, we are offering this extraordinary opportunity to you at a special price of $1,200,000.

This offer represents an excellent chance for you to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price, ensuring a substantial return on investment. We believe in fostering long-term relationships with our clients, and we are committed to providing unparalleled customer service throughout the transaction process.

Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to the growth and success of your business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
